PostToolUse.command: bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.js ]]; then grep -n "\bvar\b" "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" && echo "⚠️  Found var usage — should be const/let" || true; grep -n "innerHTML" "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" && echo "⚠️  Found innerHTML — security concern, use createElement" || true; fi'
bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == */manifest.json ]]; then python3 -m json.tool "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo "❌ Invalid JSON in manifest.json"; fi'
